Content.Text:
<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh my, are you all right? You mustn't jump out
in front of horses like that. It's dangerous.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Ah, but it feels so good to go for a long ride
again! This is my horse, Schneizel. Say hello.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You're a farmer too, correct? So of course you
must have a horse of your own, then, no? I'd
love to see it.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Goodness me. You call yourself a farmer, yet
you don't even own a horse?
<PAGE>
It's so strange. Why do none of the farmers
around here ride horses? It's so convenient.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It would have to be a thoroughbred with a fine
pedigree, of course. A discerning farmer should
accept no less.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
I see, I see. So there is nowhere in this town
where one may acquire a horse. I didn't think we
were that rural...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
How about this? I will acquire a horse for you! In
exchange, I have a request for you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
You'll agree? Wonderful! Now, in exchange for
the horse, I'll first want 10 diamonds...

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Er, my lady! Recently, our cows haven't been
producing much milk, so we haven't been able
to bake those cakes you like.
<PAGE>
If we could just get our hands on <BLUE>5 bottles of
milk</BLUE>, it would be an enormous help...

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Oh dear. Not being able to make those cakes is a
borderline disaster. What to do...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>So, here's the deal. If you bring me <BLUE>5 bottles of
milk</BLUE>, I'll get you a horse.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, I must be on my way home.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you have the milk, come by my manor.
But not on Sunday, of course. I need a day to
relax.
<PAGE>
And do make sure you have a barn first, would
you? Excellent.

<NAME_MOB_JUDY>
Ah! Lady Eliiiiise! Please wait for me!

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
I know! I'll do you a special favor and acquire a
horse for you.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
But...you do have a barn in which to stable it,
correct?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's ludicrous to think of owning a horse without
a place to stable it. I can't do anything for you
until you have a barn.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Once you have a barn, I'll see about acquiring
that horse for you. Good luck!
